forgero.config.title: Forgero Configuration
forgero.config.category.main.title: Main
forgero.config.disabledResources.tooltip: Resources that shouldn't be loaded by Forgero.
forgero.config.disabledPacks.tooltip: Packs that shouldn't be loaded by Forgero.
forgero.config.group.recipes_upgrades_an: Configuration for recipes, upgrades, and loot.
forgero.config.enableCustomRecipeDeletio: Enables deletion of recipes via custom IDs, using a datapack system.
forgero.config.enableRecipesForAllSchema: Enables recipes for all schematics, making all schematics craftable.
forgero.config.enableUpgradeInCraftingTa: Enables upgrading tools in a crafting table, for example, from wood to metal.
forgero.config.disableVanillaLoot.toolti: Stops vanilla tools from appearing in vanilla/modded loot pools.
forgero.config.disableVanillaTools.toolt: Disables crafting recipes of vanilla tools.
forgero.config.convertVanillaRecipesToFo: Convert vanilla recipes to Forgero tools
Repurposes vanilla tool recipes to create Forgero tools instead of vanilla tools.
forgero.config.convertVanillaToolLoot.to: Swaps vanilla tools with Forgero tools when they appear in vanilla/modded loot pools.
forgero.config.group.repairing.title: Repairing
forgero.config.enableUnbreakableTools.to: Makes tools never break when having 0 durability, instead giving them the broken status and allowing the tools to be repaired.
forgero.config.enableRepairKits.tooltip: Enables repair kits, used for storing materials in a pouch, for quick and easy repair of your tools on the go.
forgero.config.group.attributes.title: Attributes
The base level needed to apply souls to tools.
forgero.config.useEntityAttributes.toolt: Enables entity attributes for tools, which have special functionality.
forgero.config.showAttributeDifference.t: Shows differences between attributes on tools' tooltips, using arrows, colors, and numbers behind parentheses.
forgero.config.hideRarity.tooltip: Hides the rarity of tools in their tooltips.
Makes weight reduce the attack speed of tools.
forgero.config.minimumAttackSpeed.toolti: The minimum attack speed tools must have.
forgero.config.weightIncreasesHunger.too: Makes the weight of tools increase hunger.
forgero.config.weightIncreasesHungerScal: Makes weight increase hunger caused by using heavy tools using a scalar.
forgero.config.weightIncreasesHungerBase: The base chance for the weight of tools to cause hunger.
forgero.config.weightIncreasesHungerCent: Makes weight increase the center point of hunger caused by using heavy tools.
forgero.config.category.debug.title: Debug
forgero.config.category.debug.title.tool: Debug settings for debugging issues and adding new features to Forgero.
forgero.config.group.debug.title: Debug
forgero.config.group.debug.title.tooltip: Debug settings for debugging issues and adding new features to Forgero.
forgero.config.resourceLogging.tooltip: Enables resource logging to the log file.
forgero.config.logDisabledPackages.toolt: Enables logging of disabled packages to the log file.
forgero.config.exportGeneratedTextures.t: Enables exporting of generated textures to a directory on game startup.
forgero.config.group.performance.title: Performance
forgero.config.buildModelsAsync.tooltip: Builds models asynchronously (off-thread) so the game's main server thread and render thread aren't blocked during model building.
